column4: I'm looking for an easy way to manage my network connections. Can anyone please help me? Network manager will not work on my lan card... :(! So now changing networks is really painfull... and I repeat this process daily... :( help me please.
what kind of card do you have? have you tried an alternate network-manager like wicd?
I have a wireless card that IS supported by the network manager, but my lan card is not...
Where can I find another network manager?
